product_name: Kate SomervilleEradiKate 3% Sulfur Daily Foaming Cleanser + Acne Treatment
summary: SummaryHighlightsHSA/FSA eligibleKate Somerville's TikTok breakout Star! EradiKate 3% Sulfur Daily Foaming Cleanser is a clinical-strength acne cleanser developed for acne-prone skin, formulated to help combat blackheads, sebaceous filaments, and acne while preventing new breakouts.
details: DetailsBenefitsTarget blackheads + pimplesKeep pores clear without overdryingManage oil + prevent new breakoutsKey Ingredients3% Sulfur : This anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory acne-fighter helps eliminate excess oil, blemishes, and sebaceous filaments while calming skin.Natural Oat Extract: Helps to reduce, absorb and balance sebum.Botanical Complex with Honey + Rice Bran Extracts : Helps calm and soothe skin.Research Results100% of users demonstrated immediate and week-long improvements in skin shine, the appearance of visible pores, and oil control.100% of users demonstrated an improvement in skin clarity immediately and 1 week of use.90% of users agreed the product minimizes blackheads and decongests pores after 1 week of use.*based on an independent clinical study of 30 participantsItem 2531098How To UseGood for: Morning + EveningHow often: DailyApplication: Apply a small amount to wet face and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse with cool water, pat dry and continue with your normal skincare routine.PRO TIP: Our classic sulfur treatment cleanser doubles as a mask for targeting sebaceous filaments. Apply to skin and let it sit for 2-3 minutes before rinsing with cool water. Focus on the t-zone!Precautions: Avoid contact with eye area. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Coco-Glucoside, Acrylates Copolymer, Coconut Alcohol, Glycereth-18 Ethylhexanoate, Glycereth-18, Stearyl Alcohol, Honey Extract/Mel/Extrait de Miel, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Oligopeptide-10, Boswellia Serrata Extract, Behenyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Disodium Carboxyethyl Siliconate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Good for: Morning + EveningHow often: DailyApplication: Apply a small amount to wet face and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse with cool water, pat dry and continue with your normal skincare routine.PRO TIP: Our classic sulfur treatment cleanser doubles as a mask for targeting sebaceous filaments. Apply to skin and let it sit for 2-3 minutes before rinsing with cool water. Focus on the t-zone!Precautions: Avoid contact with eye area. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

reviews.headline: The closest thing to a miracle product I've ever encountered
reviews.comments: This cleanser got rid of my stubborn sebaceous filaments on my nose in ONE use. I have never had another product work so well or so quickly. I hate that it's so expensive, but thankfully a little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Perfect acne cleanser
reviews.comments: Not harsh like other "acne prone" products can be. Heals breakouts fast and fades scaring! My face has never been more clear! Only con is that it smells a bit bad because of he Sulfur but Ill take itâ€¦ I only use it in the evening for that reason.

reviews.headline: Hormonal and Cystic Acne
reviews.comments: Ive struggled with hormonal and cystic acne for 13 years now. I started using this approximately 2 weeks ago and ive noticed a huge difference. The first few days i did have more breakouts than normal, but i noticed they went away a lot faster than normal. The smell sucks, but its just the beauty of sulfer products. I plan on coming back aftef 3 months to give it my full review but so far so good!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: It works just as great as my prescribed sulfur acne cleansers.

reviews.headline: Best Purchase Ever!
reviews.comments: I have tried many products to clear my acne. I never had it before, up until a trip to the lake. From there, it was almost impossible to clear my skin. I purchased this item and after using it every night as a mask for about a week, my acne disappeared.  I used it now once a week as a mask. It saved my skin!!!

reviews.headline: Great for rosacea and sebaceous filaments
reviews.comments: Loved this product as someone with rosacea. I use this 1-2 times per week after a gentle cleanser. I will apply to clean, dry skin and leave on for 7-10 minutes as a mask then wash off. Definitely controls oil and sebaceous filaments. Did not irritate my skin at all. Although, I may not recommend using this as a mask every day for those with dry or sensitive skin. I bought two on sale. Luckily, you only use a small amount at a time so I expect it to last a while.

reviews.headline: So far good
reviews.comments: I notice my skin gotten brighter have a few acne scars but do notice a difference since using this product .. would repurchase

reviews.headline: Clears blackheads
reviews.comments: My son has blackheads on his nose and this stuff clears them out. I bought it on sale so it wasn't too bad but full price is a no go for me unfortunately.

reviews.headline: Worth it.
reviews.comments: Powerful cleanser. I got it during the 50% off sale and im so happy i did. I rotate this cleanser and the la roche gentle cleanser. Its phenomenal!!!

reviews.headline: life changing
reviews.comments: I heard about this product from Dr. Idriss on tiktok for Sebaceous filaments/oily skin/large pores. I bought this when it was half price during the days of beauty event. This product is AMAZING! I only use it 2-3 times a week and it has completely changed my skin. My sebaceous filaments are much less noticeable and my skin looks so much brighter. I will definitely be repurchasing this! I wish I bought more when it was half price because it is definitely pricey.

reviews.headline: No ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
reviews.comments: I do NOT typically have sensitive skin... this cleanser messed my skin up HORRIBLY. My skin reacted almost instantly, and three days later, my face is still horribly bumpy and irritated. I've never experienced anything like this in my life! Shocked by these positive reviews

reviews.headline: Skin Healer!
reviews.comments: I have really bad perioral dermatitis around my mouth from skin balancing and barrier issues in my late 20's. I also have large sebaceous filaments on my nose, and have since my early teens. Since finding this product I have noticed a huge difference in my skin. It's not so red and inflamed around my mouth/chin where the dermatitis was/is. The filaments in my nose are way less prominent as well. I can tell my skin isn't so oily and inflamed after workouts and day to day routine. Overall, I feel like this gives me a good cleanse without stripping everything away and giving me that tight face feeling. It definitely feels more balanced and calm. Please never get rid of this as this is something that is helping so, so much!

reviews.headline: Good face wash
reviews.comments: Ive been using this for a few months now instead of panoxyl and it works really well to get rid of acne and prevent new breakouts from formingit also doesnt bleach my skin. The only thing i dont like about this is it makes my skin dry other than that i recommend this face wash

reviews.headline: Best!
reviews.comments: It's the best. Trust me.

reviews.headline: you get what you pay for
reviews.comments: i have gone through at least 2-3 bottles of this face wash and can't see myself using another one ever. initially my main interest in this face wash was for anti-redness and anti-inflammation, which OVER TIME i saw improvement in. what i didnt expect was the decrease in acne and appearance of sebacious fillaments/pores. they used to be huge on my nose. now theyre very small and disappearing. i use this face wash once a day at night, allowing a layer of it to sit on my face while i wash my body. then i wash it off. my skin does not feel dry or tight afterwards. its pricey, almost to the point where i gave it 4 stars, but it is worth it to me + the smell is not that bad compared to other sulfur treatments.

reviews.headline: So helpful for redness
reviews.comments: I have struggled with perioral dermatitis for YEARS. I finally tried this product, and it's the first winter that I haven't left the house every day with a ring of redness around my mouth/chin. Can't recommend it enough.

reviews.headline: Doesn't clean enough to prevent pimples
reviews.comments: Doesn't work for me, more pimples than usual and I normally dont have them.

reviews.headline: I tried to love it
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this so much since everyone talked great things about it however on the morning after the first use, my acne was 10x more infamed, it was cystic, and painful. Gave it 4 uses total, 2 nights and 2 mornings and I could not continue. Wondering if my skin was possibly purging and I could have trusted the process a little more, but it was honestly painful, and I couldn't continue.

reviews.headline: Simply the Best
reviews.comments: I have the most sensitive skin, with a more oily base. I have tried Cerave and La Roche Posay, both dry my skin, irritate it, and cause perioral dermatitis. This is the one product, my holy grail, that doesn't negatively impact my skin. It improves my larger pores and leaves my skin smooth and refreshed. The smell is a little funky but the outcome of the product is too good.

reviews.headline: Works as Promoted
reviews.comments: This cleanser does its job as described. It starts clearing acne and unbalanced skin immediately. In addition, I have only been using this for a week and it is clearing my perioral dermatitis! I am beyond thrilled to finally have found something otc to treat this condition. The smell is slightly unpleasant but to be expected, I guess, with sulfur.

faceoff_positive.comments: I am so grateful for this face wash! I was hesitant to spend the money since I had tried so many different recommended & highly reviewed cleansers with no luck (and sometimes those cleansers made my breakouts worse); but the EradiKate Daily Foaming Cleanser is a GAME CHANGER, seriously. I didn't struggle with REAL acne (not just your every day pop-up zit here & there) until a year or so ago and it just hit me as I started approaching 30. I have PCOS and my acne has been attributed to new hormonal changes with age, and buddy it's no joke: cystic acne, recurring deep & painful zits. At first I kept picking & popping them so I'm left with dark scarring. I now use EradiKate as part of my daily routine: once in the morning and once at night, and it has worked WONDERS! When I have breakouts, I can tell the cleanser starts working immediately to dry up the blemishes & breakout itself, NOT my clear skin around it. It has been fading the scarring and evening my skin tone (I'm white and fair-to-olive skin tone). I have combination oily to dry skin that leans toward sensitive (allergic to Benzoyl Peroxide) and have had zero problems with drying or redness. It leaves my skin super smooth and brightens it. The smell is not great, a little sulfuric - but who the heck cares when it works so well?? Just go along with your toner and moisturizer and it covers up the smell. My husband still loves the smell of my skin so it must not be bad :) To anyone suffering from late onset acne, adult acne, hormonal acne, etc., give it a try! It for real changed everything for me.
faceoff_positive.headline: FINALLY An Adult Acne Face Wash That Works WONDERS

faceoff_negative.comments: I have used 3 Kate Somerville cleansers, so I can do a comparison of the three: Gentle Daily Cleanser, ExfoliKate Cleanser and EradiKate Cleanser. If you are prone to small breakouts and have combination skin, I recommend the ExfoliKate Cleanser for daily night time use. It is very gentle, but it cleans my skin without stripping it. I would re-purchase it and highly recommend it. This EradiKate is really strong and quite drying. I only use it on occasion. I would not recommend this for daily use unless you are very oily. It tends to strip my skin of its natural oils and then I have to moisturize more to compensate for it. It also smells of sulfur, so keep that in mind. You could use it as a spot treatment and put it on for a few minutes and wash it off at the end of your shower. The Gentle Daily Cleanser is okay for summer mornings, but it is a little drying in the winter, so I tend to use it very sparingly in the winter. I also don't care for the packaging, it's a twist open lid and it is quite fluid, so it runs everywhere.
faceoff_negative.headline: For Very Oily Skin

rollup.name: EradiKate 3% Sulfur Daily Foaming Cleanser + Acne Treatment
